description: VLX600 is a small molecule which is cytotoxic to quiescent cells in colon cancer cells with an IC₅₀ of 1-10 μM. VLX600 decreases mitochondrial oxidative phosphorylation and shows enhanced cytotoxic activity under conditions of nutrient starvation. It inhibits growth of colon cancer xenografts with minimal systemic toxicity in mice.
name: VLX600
